description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              The Job
              
              You want to work in an international environment with international colleagues, you are interested in keeping track of latest technologies? You want to work under mentorship of experienced colleagues, doing the best engineering practices?
              

              As web developer, let help us build bad ass teams in our Vietnam development center, take a chance to work closely with our international teams and a possibility to reach senior status which gives you possibility to become a technology leader in the next few years.
              

              Just come to get a hot seat at 2Click Solutions and shine your career.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Your Skills and Experience
              
              Please note that we do encourage you to send your example source code (1 or a few) for us to have more chance to win. Your source code will be considered as a big plus for our CV screening.
              
              - C# and .NET framework is mandatory
              
              - Understanding of OOP, design patterns, web services and SQL server database
              
              - Knowledge of HTML and Javascript, knowing at least 1 Javascript library or framework
              
              - Understanding testing methodologies
              
              - Proactive & good at problem solving
              
              - Passionate about quality and the design of the code, productivity of the work and maintainability of the end result
              
              - English skills(reading/writing/research)
              
              - Communicate your ideas & knowledge to team mates
              
              - Self-organized, work in multifunctional and diverse team of enthusiastic tech people
              

              * Bonus points if you have some of this
              
              - Experienced with SCRUM, GIT or Team Foundation Server
              
              - Fluent Spoken English
              
              - ASP.NET core and Angular 2 experience and knowledge
              
              - NoSQL experience
              
              - Team leadership and project management experience
              
              - You go to our open source project at www.rhetos.org and give us your opinion on it during the interview
              

              Why You'll Love Working Here
              
              - International environment with super hero power and family spirit
              
              - Working closely with experienced colleagues from all around the world
              
              - Possibility to reach technical mastery and team leadership status
              
              - Very attractive salary, bonuses when deadlines are met
              
              - Flexible work hours(8-10 AM), 8 work hours
              
              - 13th month salary for Tet
              
              - Tea and Coffee for relax time
              
              - Personal development plan with performance reviews and transparent promotion scheme (salary, position and team role)
              
              - Free trainings and seminars (technical and non-technical)
              
              - Comfortable and creative working environment
              
              - Full social and health insurance according to Vietnam labor laws
              
              - Casual dress are welcomed
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                13th month salary for Tet
               







                Free trainings and seminars (technical and non-technical)
